sections.MISSION:
Killer Troop conducts URM/ M17 Transition at Range 108 from 19-23 August 2024 IOT increase infantry Squad lethality and meet the pre-requirements for BD6 and LFX.
.
Task Organization:
OIC: 2LT Golden, Dylan, +49 15115288568, SSG Fenell, Austin, +49 15117773040
RSO: SGT Nunez, Gilberto +1 4698311902
Ammo handler: SGT Anderson, Bronco, +49 15227736215
ALT Ammo Handler: SGT Rush, Mick, +49 1509226577
sections.KEY TASKS: All personnel qualified on URM tables No safety incidents Familiarization with M4 to M17 transitions
sections.END STATE:
All Killer Troopers demonstrated proficiency on the functional aspects of the weapons, ammunition, and critical skills necessary to correctly and safely employ the M4, M17, and M249 in an urban environment.
Concurrent training: Weapons lanes EIB training.
